alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 22 at 2:35AM EDT until August 22 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following county, Guilford. * WHEN...Until 445 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 235 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms was starting to move out of the area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Greensboro, Summerfield, Lake Townsend, Lake Townsend Marina, Haw River State Park, Lake Jeanette Marina, Monticello and Lake Brandt. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
